page.title: 05 RUGELEY FESTIVAL WEEK
page.content: Rugeley festival Week started this Saturday. It involves all kinds of sports, competitions and different entertainments.The Festival week is held every year in June. Local groups and organisations take part. The events include a pet show. Anyone can enter their pets. The reasonable entry fee is 30p. There's "It's a Knockout" which includes all different games, a "Rock Concert" in the marquee, an Open Air Market with different stalls selling different things, a Baby Show, a Raft Race, a 3 mile Fun Run. Fun Sports which is different races where people compete for fun. A Fun Fair which is all kinds of rides and candy floss sellers. There's a Carnival Procession where people decorate lorries. These are calle "floats" To end the week a service is held at St. Augustines.
